00022 #include "rawq/test/RawQWorkflowTest.h"

00024 #include "rawq/src/RawQWorkflow.h"

00027 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( RawQWorkflowTest );
00028 
00029 void RawQWorkflowTest::setUp()
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 void RawQWorkflowTest::tearDown()
00034 {
00035 }
00036 
00037 void RawQWorkflowTest::testProperties()
00038 {
00039         const double eps = 1e-10;
00040         CRawQWorkflow r;
00041 
00042         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetVerticalZones() == 4);
00043         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetHorizontalZones() == 4);
00044         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(r.GetPercentBG(), 2.0, eps);
00045 
00046         r.SetVerticalZones(1);
00047         r.SetHorizontalZones(2);
00048         r.SetPercentBG(3.0f);
00049 
00050         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetVerticalZones() == 1);
00051         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetHorizontalZones() == 2);
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(r.GetPercentBG(), 3.0, eps);
00053 
00054         r.SetDefaults();
00055 
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetVerticalZones() == 4);
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetHorizontalZones() == 4);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(r.GetPercentBG(), 2.0, eps);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void RawQWorkflowTest::testCompute()
00062 {
00063         const double eps = 1e-6;
00064         CRawQWorkflow r;
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.ComputeRawQ("./data/Test3.CEL", "./data") == CRawQWorkflow::NoError);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(r.GetRawQ(), 6.3773966, eps);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void RawQWorkflowTest::testCompute_no_CEL_file()
00070 {
00071         CRawQWorkflow r;
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.ComputeRawQ("./data/no_file.CEL", "./data") == CRawQWorkflow::UnableToReadCELFile);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void RawQWorkflowTest::testCompute_no_CDF_file()
00076 {
00077         CRawQWorkflow r;
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.ComputeRawQ("./data/Test3.CEL", "./no_data_path") == CRawQWorkflow::UnableToReadCDFFile);
00079 }
